title: Chicken ranch: a legal brothel in Nevada
creator_credit: Sandi Sissel, Nicholas Broomfield, Central Independent Television (UK) and Churchill Films
brief_description: A documentary film about the best known legalised brothel in America, the Chicken Ranch in Las Vegas. The film observes the day to day lives of the women who work in the brothel. Their average age is 21 and their earnings are split 50/50 with the house.
